full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM GYI BSNYEN PA BYA TSUL SBYIN SREG DANG BCAS BEE t'U RYA'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BZ BZHUGS SO, ,
